column5: Hi everyone,  I know the storm is coming but I somwhow have time to go fishing this coming Sunday (tomorrow) for Trout  have not seen any posts regrading how each river has been doing Any recommendations on which river I should go to to maximizing my chance og catching something?  PS: I live in Southern Ontario  Thanks
Not the ones that are frozen, closed or where the fish are spawning.

Niagara river is open all year around....queenston is a good start for bottom bouncing.  Or if you float fish then the Glen or the Whirlpool is a better start.  Port dalhousie in st. catharines is also open all year around...you bottom bounce there as well.
